title: FSI for buildings outside congested area in commercial zone - the basic FSI permissible shall be 2
clause_text: FSI for buildings outside congested area in commercial zone - the basic FSI permissible shall be 2.00 for commercial cum residential use or purely residential use and 2.50 for purely commercial use.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: FSI for buildings outside congested area in commercial zone - the basic FSI permissible shall be 2.00 for commercial cum residential use or purely residential use and 2.50 for purely commercial use.
